display.title: Replicating the Ancient Forge
display.description: A miniature Ancient Forge Structure Kit can be made by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, Magma Block, 8 Polished Basalt, 4 Basalt & a Essence of the Sun onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 1x Magma Block 8x Polished Basalt 4x Basalt 1x Essence of the Sun | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
